Hi all,,
I am new to this software , I have installed and i m using version=
 1.14.0. My issue is that i wana set a job with the following settings-

1.=
It should scan only a particular domain, not outside (e.g. www.abc.org)

2.=
It should get only success 200 OK status pages.

3.I have to get only PDF,D=
OC,XLS files in the log entries(Could not figure it how to do it)

Please h=
elp me out.
